response.original_title: Life, Cycling And The Circle Of Death
response.overview: Two best friends, who happen to be pro cyclists, ride the historic Tour de France ‘Circle of Death’ route in a beautiful film that looks at life, love, and what happens when two paths diverge.  Ruth Winder and Tayler Wiles of Trek-Segafredo have formed a unique bond, having lived and breathed cycling’s World Tour together on the same team for several years. As Ruth approaches retirement this winter, the iconic cols of the Tourmalet, Aubisque, Aspin, and Peyresourde serve as the stunning setting for one final, emotional ride together as pros.
response.title: Life, Cycling And The Circle Of Death

results.name: LIFE, CYCLING & THE CIRCLE OF DEATH
